passage: In the historical novel The Surrender Tree , Cuban American author Margarita Engle uses poetry rather than prose ______ blank the true story of Cuban folk hero Rosa La Bayamesa.
question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.D: Choice D is the best answer. The convention being tested is the use of finite and nonfinite verb forms within a sentence. The nonfinite to-infinitive "to tell" is correctly used to form a nonfinite (infinitive) clause that explains the reason Engle uses poetry in her novel.
answer_rationales.A: Choice A is incorrect because the finite present tense verb "tells" can't be used in this way to explain the reason that Engle uses poetry in her novel.
answer_rationales.B: Choice B is incorrect because the finite past tense verb "told" can't be used in this way to explain the reason that Engle uses poetry in her novel.
answer_rationales.C: Choice C is incorrect because the finite present progressive tense verb "is telling" can't be used in this way to explain the reason that Engle uses poetry in her novel.
